title: Still a Long Way to Maximum Employment
itunes:title: Still a Long Way to Maximum Employment
description:
Jeffrey Cleveland, Chief Economist at Payden & Rygel, discusses the June jobs report, and the timeline for a Fed rate hike. Leonid Bershidsky, Bloomberg Opinion Columnist, discusses his column, Dark Markets Can Be a Geopolitical Force. Tom Gimbel, Founder & CEO of LaSalle Network, discusses the June payrolls report, wages, and the hiring challenges in the labor market. Chad Oviatt, Director of Investment Management for Huntington Private Bank, discusses the June jobs, hedges for inflation, and the timeline for Fed tapering. Hosted by Matt Miller and Paul Sweeney.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
